```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

source(here("R/fish_diversity.R"))
```


Write a function that takes a vector of fish names and always returns three items
the most common fish,
the rarest fish
the total number of fish

```{r}
# read in the fish data 
fish <- read.delim(here("data", "fish.txt"))

# use fish_diversity function 
fish_diversity(fish)
```
